author: Liu, YP; Qu, XJ
adress: China Med Univ, Hosp 1, Liaoning Prov Clin Res Ctr Canc, Dept Med Oncol,Key Lab Anticanc Drugs & Biotherap, Shenyang, Liaoning, Peoples R China
title: Upregulation of Serine Proteinase Inhibitor Clade B Member 3 (SERPINB3) Expression by Stromal Cell-Derived Factor (SDF-1)/CXCR4/Nuclear Factor kappa B (NF-kappa B) Promotes Migration and Invasion of Gastric Cancer Cells
